product_name: REI CoolMax EcoMade Quarter Socks - Boys' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: REI CoolMax(R) EcoMade(TM) Quarter Socks are made from recycled plastic bottles. They deliver moisture-wicking comfort and performance for your young adventurer. CoolMax EcoMade fabric offers the same moisture-wicking, quick-drying performance as regular CoolMax, yet is made of recycled PET. Nylon adds durability and spandex offers stretch and shape retention. Mesh-knit instep panels promote airflow and move moisture away from feet, keeping them dry and blister free. Lightly cushioned bottoms and reinforced heels and toes add shock absorption and protection from wear. Lin Toe(R) "no feel" seams help eliminate irritation and chafing along toes. Closeout.
short_description: REI CoolMax(R) EcoMade(TM) Quarter Socks are made from recycled plastic bottles. They deliver moisture-wicking comfort and performance for your young adventurer.
